problem_summary_simple: Maximize weight gained by eating 4 pizzas daily, with different gains on odd/even days.
problem_summary_technical: Sort pizzas by weight; greedily pick largest for odd days and second largest for even days to maximize total weight.
key_insights: To maximize the gain, we should always use the heaviest available pizzas for the highest gain opportunities.
On odd days, we gain the weight of the heaviest pizza (Z). On even days, we gain the weight of the second heaviest (Y).
Sorting the pizzas in descending order allows for a straightforward greedy selection of the best pizzas for each day type.
